profile.positions: Freelancer, UI/UX Designer, Web Developer, Web Designer

bio.name: Majedul Islam
bio.description: I am a Web Developer, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work. With 20 years experience as a professional Web developer, I have acquired the skills and knowledge necessary to make your project a success. I enjoy every step of the design process, from discussion and collaboration to concept and execution, but I find the most satisfaction in seeing the finished product do everything for you that it was created to do.

skill_section.title: Some About my Abilities
skill_section.description: I have very rare of skills but those are confident. I feel pretty comfortable with these technologies for development. I have passed a long time to learn web development with the most popular technologies such as MERN, you will find my best MERN stack projects if you look at my portfolio.
